description.en:
"I wanted to see him make this kind of face." I was a gloomy nerd in high school, and at that time I was entwined with Washizawa Natsuo – my dark past. Now, a few years later, we have reunited and Natsuo asked me out. This is my chance. We'll go out, then I'll break up with him, leaving him in tatters!
[hr][b][u]Polish / Polski:[/u][/b]
[spoiler] "Chciałem zobaczyć taką minę" - Suzuki Hiromu w czasach liceum był ofiarą losu. Postanowił to zmienić - zaczął o siebie dbać i znalazł pracę w salonie fryzjerskim. Pewnego razu do jego salonu przychodzi Natsuo jego szkolny kolega, lecz go nie rozpoznaje i prosi o chodzenie. Czy to jego szansa na zemstę?[/spoiler]
[hr]Multi-work series; Suggested reading order:
1: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/15200/]Sabita Yoru Demo Koi wa Sasayaku[/url] - Main Story
2: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/18394/]Azami[/url] - Prequel to Main Story & Sequels
3: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/13498/]Renai Rubi no Tadashii Furikata[/url] - Sequel #1
4: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/19857/]Narrow Place Collection[/url] - Side story to Sequel #1
5: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/17936/]Hadakeru Kaibutsu[/url] - Sequel #2
6: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/24709/]Sweet Sweet[/url] - Extra Illustrations
